abstract: Reuters: “Comcast Corp. urged a U.S. appeals court on Tuesday to overturn a decision by federal regulators, who refused to a waive a rule designed to open up the market for cable TV set-top boxes.”
lead_paragraph: Reuters: “Comcast Corp. urged a U.S. appeals court on Tuesday to overturn a decision by federal regulators, who refused to a waive a rule designed to open up the market for cable TV set-top boxes.”

headline.main: Comcast Asks Court to Reverse FCC Set-Top Box Rule
